scripts.worklet: npm run adsr && npm run osc && npm run impulse && npm run mika && npm run lfo && npm run karplus && npm run filter && npm run pcm && npm run wt && npm run seq
scripts.adsr: esbuild src/adsr/worklet.ts --bundle --minify | sed -e 's/^/export const PROCESSOR = \`/' -e 's/$/\`;/'  > src/adsr/processor.ts
scripts.filter: esbuild src/va-filter/worklet.ts --bundle --minify | sed -e 's/^/export const PROCESSOR = \`/' -e 's/$/\`;/'  > src/va-filter/processor.ts
scripts.impulse: esbuild src/impulse/worklet.ts --bundle --minify | sed -e 's/^/export const PROCESSOR = \`/' -e 's/$/\`;/'  > src/impulse/processor.ts
scripts.karplus: esbuild src/karplus-strong/worklet.ts --bundle --minify | sed -e 's/^/export const PROCESSOR = \`/' -e 's/$/\`;/'  > src/karplus-strong/processor.ts
scripts.lfo: esbuild src/lfo/worklet.ts --bundle --minify | sed -e 's/^/export const PROCESSOR = \`/' -e 's/$/\`;/'  > src/lfo/processor.ts
scripts.mika: esbuild src/mika/worklet.ts --bundle --minify | sed -e 's/^/export const PROCESSOR = \`/' -e 's/$/\`;/'  > src/mika/processor.ts
scripts.seq: esbuild src/sequencer/worklet.ts --bundle --minify | sed -e 's/^/export const PROCESSOR = \`/' -e 's/$/\`;/'  > src/sequencer/processor.ts
scripts.osc: esbuild src/va-oscillator/worklet.ts --bundle --minify | sed -e 's/^/export const PROCESSOR = \`/' -e 's/$/\`;/'  > src/va-oscillator/processor.ts
scripts.pcm: esbuild src/pcm-oscillator/worklet.ts --bundle --minify | sed -e 's/^/export const PROCESSOR = \`/' -e 's/$/\`;/'  > src/pcm-oscillator/processor.ts
scripts.wt: esbuild src/wt-oscillator/worklet.ts --bundle --minify | sed -e 's/^/export const PROCESSOR = \`/' -e 's/$/\`;/'  > src/wt-oscillator/processor.ts
